title: Are there any plans to widen Gordon road from Market street to College Rd? what is the status of the Militray Cutooff extension to the 140 Bypass?
text:
As is the case with many, many projects right now, all new work is on
hold due to financial reasons -- for the time being. We'll know more
early this summer. As for plan to widen Gordon Road, none that we can
find in the immediate future. thanks,
